mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lee, in response to a letter of Representative Chester D. Hubbard, of Wheeling, West Virginia, clarifies information regarding a letter he had written to Gen. Rosecrans in August of 1868.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rosecrans, William S. (William Starke), 1819-1898
Hubbard, C. D. (Chester Dorman), 1814-1891

mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter to Chester D. Hubbard, January 22, 1869 (correspondence)
